meanings.definition: Relating to the arrangement of the natural and artificial physical features of an area.
meanings.sent1: The topographical map showed all the hills and rivers in great detail.
meanings.sent2: The topographical survey helped us understand the layout of the land.
meanings.sent3: The topographical puzzle of the landscape was challenging to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a topographical map of memories, each with its own unique terrain.
meanings.sent5: The topographical features of the terrain made hiking an exciting adventure.

meanings.definition: The detailed description or representation of the features of a place or region.
meanings.sent1: The topographical of the area was so detailed, it included every tree and rock.
meanings.sent2: The topographical provided valuable information for the construction project.
meanings.sent3: He found humor in the topographical that exaggerated the size of the hills.
meanings.sent4: The topographical of her emotions painted a vivid picture of her inner world.
meanings.sent5: The topographical in the book brought the fictional world to life.
